COLUMN (basic) [FML].description: A simple flex based Column snippet with a common alignment

COLUMN (centered) [FML].description: A sized Column snippet with its children centered on both axis

COLUMN (w/ alignments) [FML].description: A vertically expanding Column snippet with separately aligned children on each axis

body:
<COL color="random,random" radius="8" border="all" bordercolor="random" borderwidth="2" elevation="4" shadowcolor="random" shadowx="0" shadowy="0">
    ${0}
</COL>
COLUMN (decorated) [FML].description: A vertically expanding Column snippet with decoration attributes
